itemDescription: English Navy, Army and Air Force Institutes manager

wikipedia_page.main: John Steven Leake  (26 October 1949 – 13 February 2000) was an English recipient of the Distinguished Service Medal whilst working for the Navy, Army and Air Force Institutes (NAAFI), one of only twelve to be issued to the British forces during the Falklands War. Prior to working for the NAAFI, he worked in private security and was a soldier in the Devonshire and Dorset Regiment of the British Army.

response: John Leake (1656–1720) was an English flag officer and politician.
John Leake may also refer to:
*John Leake (NAAFI manager) (1949–2000), English recipient of the Distinguished Service Medal
*John Leake, 50, British Royal Navy sailor, cancer.
